price: 但他们否认他，地震就袭击了他们。顷刻之间，他们都僵卧在各人的家中。
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
